verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}To hear with my heart, to see with my soul To be guided by a hand I cannot hold To trust in a way that I cannot see That’s what faith must be{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When the universe fell from His fingertips He decided He wanted some fellowship But the man and the woman would not submit So He made a better way{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When the moment was right He sent His own Son And He opened the way so that everyone Could hope and believe that when time was done He’d be able to make us one{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Now I understand that there is a key It’s Jesus in me, a reality That God is in Christ and that Christ’s in me And with faith I see what is unseen{/lang-eng}
